credentialSubject.name: Dan Driver
credentialSubject.evidenceDescription: When driving rideshare, much of my income depends on the ability to develop a relationship quickly with the rider, as tip income is a large percentage of my earnings.  Having a relaxed, friendly vibe and quickly finding areas of common interest is a skill I have acquired and enjoy using.

criteria.narrative: The ability to develop a rapport in a short time and build a positive relationship in a short conversation.

achievement.description: When driving rideshare, much of my income depends on the ability to develop a relationship quickly with the rider, as tip income is a large percentage of my earnings.  Having a relaxed, friendly vibe and quickly finding areas of common interest is a skill I have acquired and enjoy using.
achievement.name: Customer service and building rapport quickly
